response.overview: Alexander, the King of Macedonia, leads his legions against the giant Persian Empire. After defeating the Persians, he leads his army across the then known world, venturing farther than any westerner had ever gone, all the way to India.
response.tagline: The greatest legend of all was real
response.title: Alexander

cast.name: Bin Bunluerit
cast.original_name: บิณฑ์ บรรลือฤทธิ์

results.name: The Start Of The Battle Of Gaugamela
